title: New: SPLASHH – Need It
content:
Despite numerous technical difficulties, SPLASHH‘s set at The Great Escape was undoubtedly one of the festivals highlights.

Possessing a raw, unadulterated energy that’s found in so few modern acts, there’s a reason why they’re regarded as one of the hottest new talents in the UK. New single Need It is a riproaring three minutes of infectious, gritty pop; upbeat and deliriously lively. Released on LuvLuvLuv on 30 July, you can guarantee that this won’t be the last we hear from SPLASHH.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
